# tf.keras.backend.argmin

Returns the index of the minimum value along an axis.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/argmin"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.argmin</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/argmin"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.argmin</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.argmin(
    x,
    axis=-1
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: Tensor or variable.
* <b>`axis`</b>: axis along which to perform the reduction.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
